name: Stand and Defend
description:
Stand and Defend - One against infinity in a hail of bullets.

Note: While the game contains no blood, it does contain usage of guns and deadly deadly lasers. +15 or older only. The game is also only in its early stages at the moment and is SERIOUSLY DIFFICULT (at least for me). Some things will be fixed and changed overtime.

Stand and Defend is a first person shooter made with Unreal Engine 5 that places you in a series of different environments against an endless and unrelenting hoard of enemies equipped with weapons and guns.

Each enemy you face has its own way of dealing with you and as the rounds progress, more and more units will appear. On the other hand, use credits you obtain from defeating rounds to purchase upgrades to your stats and abilities, along with using equipment you bring into the mission to eliminate all hostiles.

The choice of how you approach any scenario is up to you - You must not let them defeat you.

Contains:

  • 7 different equipment options.
  • 3 playable maps (and a tutorial map).
  • 7 different enemy types.
  • 8 upgrades.
  • 30 survival waves along with an endless amount of randomly-generated waves.
  • Brutally high difficulty.

Enjoy!
